title: London Luxury
transcripts:
Skin Glow Pillow with Cupron® Copper Technology

These pillows will help you get your beauty sleep in every sense. The copper oxide plated fibers are designed to restore the skin and the Skin Glow Pillow with Cupron Copper Technologycupron-infused fabric is designed to eliminate bacteria, fungus and microbes, reducing the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines while you sleep. 85% cotton/15% cupron polyester. 300 thread count. Machine wash.

Each year, Americans spend millions of dollars on beauty products that promise to make them look younger. While most discover that expensive skin creams and surgery dont payoff, one companys new breakthrough in the fight against visible signs of aging is giving you the power to turn back the clock while you sleep.

While researching the properties of natural copper, scientists noticed that copper embedded fabric reduced the appearance of wrinkles, crows feet, and fine lines. As a natural and non-sensitizing element required by the human body, coppers properties are clinically proven to penetrate the skin and result in a healthier appearance.

London Luxury, a manufacturer of beneficial bedding products partnered with Cupron®, the scientists behind this copper technology to create Skin Glow, a line of bedding products that renew the appearance of your skin.

Skin Glow products such as pillows, comforters, pillow covers, and eye masks provide a gentle and natural solution for dramatic restoration of the skins youthful look.

Encapsulated in these fibers is pure, natural copper oxide. And what they do is when theyre exposed to water, perspiration of your face is enough, they will release copper ions.

When used in direct contact with the skin, products made with copper-infused fibers are clinically proven to smooth the appearance of wrinkles and fine lines.
